title: Autonomous Agents on Blockchains: Standards, Execution Models, and Trust Boundaries
summary: Advances in large language models have enabled agentic AI systems that can reason, plan, and interact with external tools to execute multi-step workflows, while public blockchains have evolved into a programmable substrate for value transfer, access control, and verifiable state transitions.
